item.description:
Hello!

I know this is kinda last minute, but I thought we can do a camping / funyak (inflatable kayak) trip over by the western side of massachusetts.

My boyfriend gets out of work late on that saturday (3rd), but we can stay til the monday (5th) to really enoy the nature.

We can camp at Mohawk Trail State Forest (we are at site #10) to make some fire and share delicious campfire food.
http://www.mass.gov/d...

On the 4th (sunday) we can head over to Crab Apple Whitewater to do some very safe funyakking
http://www.crabapplei...
I was told that funyaks are very safe and no need to worry about falling into the water.
We're booked for the "DEERFIELD RIVER-FUNYAK" and its 8 miles long and 3 hours.

Oh and I was told not to use the GPS to get to Crab Apple, and use the direction on the website
http://www.crabapplew...

My number is 203-577-7442 (Sun Ha), if you have any questions.
See you then!
item.name: 4th of July weekend
